game.name: Air War 1941
game.description:
It is time to turn your tough face on and set your way towards a brand new adventure thriller! We have brought to you today a free online Metal Animal game where survival rate is pretty low. Only those who are skilled enough to enter the battlefield with a full confidence will be able to survive for long. Why there is a need to wait anymore? Try out this free online war game and show the world that you are a true adventure champion!
You have a good team of cute and furry animals along with a wonderful range of advanced weapons to control. Evil animals will keep coming to you in different waves. They want to destroy your tank and put you down the ground. Show off your intense tank handling skills and clean the area from the unlimited waves of enemies in this one of the best free war games! Get a powerful gun by using tank main gun! 
Enjoy the freedom of dragging and placing metal animals onto the strategic positions on your given tank! The huge brigade of your enemies will include different animals like sheep, foxes, pandas, cats and more. They all are lashed with the advanced guns, so try to be alert all the time and finish them before they destroy your tank. Play like a champion and do the unforgettable rescue! This cool html5 tank game features innovative drag and drop mechanic. You can try it on smartphone and tablet including Windows Phone, Android devices, Samsung, iPad, iPhone and more. All the best to have a best in this best strategy game!!
